overview: From 2025-12-15 to 2025-12-16, elizaos/eliza had 0 new PRs (2 merged), 24 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topIssues.title: AI Agent Payment Implementation Guide - Circle + Coinbase APIs
topIssues.author: tdnupe3
topIssues.body:
# AI Agent Payment Implementation Guide

Hi! I see you're building innovative AI agent systems. I created a comprehensive guide on autonomous AI agent payments using Circle + Coinbase APIs - based on our live marketplace with 25+ active wallets processing real USDC.

## Complete Guide Covers:
- üè¶ Circle Developer Controlled Wallets integration
- ‚õìÔ∏è Multi-chain payment processing (Ethereum, Base, Polygon)  
- üì° Agent-to-agent communication via XMTP
- üîí Security patterns for autonomous payments
- üí∞ Revenue sharing systems (85% agent, 15% platform)
- ü§ñ Coinbase AgentKit integration patterns

## Technical Implementation Details:
- Production-tested with 25+ active USDC wallets
- Multi-chain wallet management best practices
- Agent wallet security and key management
- Real-time balance tracking and notifications
- Automated fee calculation and collection

**$10 Implementation Guide:** https://coinrailz.com/report

**Live Demo:** Working payment system processing real transactions

Would love to contribute to this project or get your thoughts on the implementation patterns! The guide is based on our production system, not theory.

---
*This is about a technical implementation guide for autonomous payments in AI agent systems. If this isn't relevant to your project, feel free to close this issue.*

topIssues.title: Fix edit mode chat suggestions triggering agent responses
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Clicking "Improve the bio" in edit mode should modify the agent builder, not start a conversation with the agent.

topIssues.title: Fix avatar mismatch between edit view and sidebar
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Agent avatar displays differently in edit panel versus left sidebar.

topIssues.title: Use "Services" instead of "MCP" in UI
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Broader term that encompasses MCP, A2A, and REST integrations.

topIssues.title: Replace "RAG" terminology with plain language
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: 99% of people don't know what RAG means. Can just keep it clean and simple with the wording here. We can think of copy for this.

topPRs.title: fix(plugin-sql): optimize pre-1.6.5 migration, RLS handling and SQL organisation
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
# Risks

**Low** - All changes are backwards compatible and idempotent. Comprehensive test coverage added. Nothing is destructive

# Background

## What does this PR do?

- Adds smooth migration from pre-1.6.5 (camelCase) to 1.6.5+ (snake_case) schema
- Optimizes RLS handling: skips disable/re-enable cycle when `ENABLE_DATA_ISOLATION=true`
- Cleans up RuntimeMigrator: removes dead code, improves table filtering
- Fixes schema indexes and foreign key definitions
- Adds 20+ comprehensive migration tests

## What kind of change is this?

Bug fixes (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

# Documentation changes needed?

My changes do not require a change to the project documentation.

# Testing

## Where should a reviewer start?

`src/migrations.ts` - Main migration logic

## Detailed testing steps

```bash
cd packages/plugin-sql
bun test src/__tests__/migration/
```

**179 pass, 0 fail**

topPRs.title: fix(cli): correct startAgents API signature in e2e-tests
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary

- Fixed `startAgents` API signature mismatch in CLI's e2e-tests.ts
- Fixed unit test mock function name (`getElizaCharacter` ‚Üí `getDefaultCharacter`)

## Problem

The CLI's `elizaos test` command was failing with:
```
undefined is not an object (evaluating 'agent.character.id')
```

This was caused by the e2e-tests calling `server.startAgents` with incorrect arguments:
- **Before**: `startAgents([character], [plugins], options)` (3 separate args)
- **After**: `startAgents([{ character, plugins }], options)` (proper format)

## Test Plan

- [x] Unit tests pass: `bun test packages/cli/tests/unit/commands/test/e2e-tests.test.ts`
- [x] CLI builds successfully: `bun run build` in packages/cli
- [x] `elizaos test` runs plugin tests correctly

topContributors.summary: borisudovicic: Focused on identifying and documenting a wide range of potential user experience and UI improvements, creating 23 issues in elizaos/eliza, including suggestions for renaming sections and buttons, improving visual feedback, and redesigning core application flows.
AntoineVergne: Focused on feature work, adding a new plugin to the registry by merging PR elizaos-plugins/registry#243, which involved modifying a configuration file.

standujar: Focused on significant refactoring efforts, opening two substantial PRs, elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord#32 and elizaos-plugins/plugin-telegram#22, which involved modifying 295 files with a net addition of over 7,800 lines of code, primarily centered on refactoring and bug fixes.

tdnupe3: Initiated a new feature development by creating an issue for "AI Agent Payment Implementation Guide - Circle + Coinbase APIs" (elizaos/eliza#6244), indicating a focus on integrating payment solutions within the AI agent platform.
